name: Monster Fight!!!
description:
Monster Fight!!! is a action-fighting video game like Tekken where player can choose two battle modes, three playable character portraying three elements in the world. This game based on PC and have purposes to introduce how three elements of the world can balance each other.

Arts used in here are family friendly and the game itself contains fun-learning system where player can explore their tactic skills to choosing character and attacking the opponent.

Code, Assets, and everything in this game was made by me.
